title: Non-aural set, string Scherzo - mm 20-21 prog

content.description: Below is an excerpt from a trio for violin, viola, and cello.
content.question: The chord progression in measures 20-21 is

choices.label: Answer A is a chord progression with three chords. Answer A has a major 1 root position, major 4 root position and major 5 in root position.
Answer B is a chord progression with three chords. Answer B has a major 1 in root position, a major dominant 5 6 5 of major 5, and a major 5 in root position.
Answer C is a chord progression with three chords. Answer C has a major dominant 5 4 2 of major 5, a major dominant 5 4 3 of major 5, and a major 5 in root position.
Answer D is a chord progression with three chords. Answer D has a major dominant 5 4 2 of major 5, a major dominant 5 6 5 of major 5 and a major 5 in root position.

content.answer: Answer D is a chord progression with three chords. Answer D has a major dominant 5 4 2 of major 5, a major dominant 5 6 5 of major 5 and a major 5 in root position.
